title: Rocket and roasted beetroot salad
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1 large shallot, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon honey', '5 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '6 medium beetroots, quartered', '120g rocket', '70g toasted hazelnuts, chopped', '30g dried fruit (cranberries, cherries or blueberries)', '1/2 an avocado, peeled and cubed', '80g gorgonzola or feta cheese']
